stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, they encounter it. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. Subroutine You may pay up to 2 credits to place that many advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
text:
While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, they encounter it.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] You may pay up to 2[credit] to place that many advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
title: Herald
